physical_appearance: The image shows a pair of squeegees enclosed in a transparent plastic packaging. The squeegees are white in colour with green tips at their bottoms. At the top and front of the plastic packaging, the words 'photo accessory' and 'Konica Trading Corporation Japan' are displayed. The packaging looks crumpled.
sgcool_label_text: Squeegees are used in handling photographic films during film processing. This pair of unused squeegees are part of the darkroom photography equipment that was previously used by The Picture Farm, which was set up by the renowned photographer Willie Tang.
context_21: 45 Jalan Pemimpin, #09-00 Foo Wah Industrial Building, Thomson, Singapore
title_text: Konica film squeegees A pair of Konica film squeegees
context_20: The set of equipment was used by The Picture Farm Pte Ltd
